repos_data.description: Configuration-free text editor and IDE limited to VT100. Suitable for writing git commit messages, editing Markdown, config files, source code, man pages and for quick edit-format-compile cycles when programming. Has syntax highlighting, jump-to-error, rainbow parentheses, macros, llm tab completion, cut/paste portals and a simple gdb front-end.
A list of awesome projects related to Zig
MySQL and MariaDB  driver in native Zig
